mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran (id, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime) values (#{id},#{money},#{name},#{expectedDate},#{customerId}, #{stage},#{source},#{activityId},#{contactsId},#{createBy},#{createTime})
mapper.select: select t.id, u.name owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, c.name customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, a.name activityId, con.fullname contactsId, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime from tbl_tran t join tbl_customer c on t.customerId = c.id left join tbl_activity a on t.activityId = a.id join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id left join tbl_contacts con on con.id = t.contactsId where t.id=#{id}
select count(*) as value,stage as name from tbl_tran group by stage;
